original: Older roller coaster fans have often complained that newer coasters with their smooth steel shafts, well-lubricated mechanisms and intricate safety procedures can take the fun out of riding.  We're proud to introduce the Monster Woody Roller Coaster, constructed out of wood.  This is not the ride you are used to!  Your insides will take a pounding as the G-force twists and turns take hold.  It's the ride of your life!
translated: 老式过山车的爱好者时常抱怨现代过山车没有乐趣，钢制框架平整光滑、机械结构满是润滑油、安全措施繁琐复杂。在此我们向各位隆重介绍木板怪兽过山车，采用木质结构。这场旅途与一般的过山车大不相同！随着加速度的变化和轨道的转向，你的五脏六腑都会翻江倒海。这也是你人生的旅途！

original: has reopened after last month's incident.
translated: 已于上个月的事故后重新营业。
